001import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
002
003/**
004 * sample http applet
005 *
006 * @author matecsaba
007 */
008public class sample {
009
010    /**
011     * this is needed for cli startup
012     *
013     * @param args command line parameters
014     */
015    public static void main(String[] args) {
016        sample app = new sample();
017        String a;
018        try {
019            ByteArrayOutputStream buf = new ByteArrayOutputStream();
020            a = "" + app.getClass();
021            a = app.httpRequest("http://localhost/" + a, "./" + a, "cli",
022                    "clibrowser", "user", args, buf);
023            a = "type=" + a + "\r\ndata:\r\n" + buf;
024        } catch (Exception e) {
025            a = "exception " + e.getMessage();
026        }
027        System.out.println(a);
028    }
029
030    /**
031     * static variable
032     */
033    public static int stat;
034
035    /**
036     * global variable
037     */
038    public int glob;
039
040    /**
041     * do one request
042     *
043     * @param url url of app
044     * @param path path of app
045     * @param peer client address
046     * @param agent user agent
047     * @param user auth data
048     * @param par parameters
049     * @param buf result buffer, if empty, pathname must present
050     * @return [pathname"][file name.]extension
051     * @throws Exception if something went wrong
052     */
053    public String httpRequest(String url, String path, String peer,
054            String agent, String user, String[] par, ByteArrayOutputStream buf)
055            throws Exception {
056        stat++;
057        glob++;
058        String pars = "";
059        for (int i = 0; i < par.length; i++) {
060            pars += "<br/>" + par[i];
061        }
062        String s = "stat=" + stat + "<br/>glob=" + glob + "<br/>url=" + url
063                + "<br/>path=" + path + "<br/>peer=" + peer + "<br/>agent="
064                + agent + "<br/>user=" + user + pars + "<br/>";
065        buf.write(s.getBytes());
066        return "html";
067    }
068
069}
